评论概述: Nice make up bag, beautiful design and lined inside
评论详情: This is a nice sized, made of good material that's strong yet soft to the touch. The celestrial design is beautiful and it has lining inside which increases it's durability. The zipper slides smoothly and there are no loose strings to get snagged, as the bag is sewn and crafted with care. Overall, very happy with this bag:-) I will probably use it to store some extra decks of cards instead of make up, it would also be great for storing crystals, or jewelry.

This makeup bag is a good size, and I like that it has a lining. I wish it had an inner pocket. Also, the outer material is textured, so the print has that same texture, just makes the design not as clear.

评论概述: RYYCDOI Funny Disco Dancing Skeleton Makeup Bag
评论详情: This unique makeup bag features a fun disco dancing skeleton design, blending gothic and dark academia aesthetics. It serves as a versatile Halloween gift for women, offering a touch of humor and horror. Ideal for storing cosmetics, this bag combines spooky charm with practical use.
It's cute, it's durable, it's a decent size for what I use it for (sticker holding), and I really feel this would be a good mini travel bag for your knapsack or carry-on.

Colorful and festive graphics that include jack ‘o lanterns and spider webs are a feature of this seasonal makeup bag.  The pattern is on both sides of the bag which measures 7 3/4 by 9 1/2 inches. The fabric used is sturdy and includes a full satiny lining. The nylon zipper operates smoothly and has a metal pull for easy opening and closing. A fun way to celebrate the season.
Perfect for my makeup. It's well made and can hold a lot of makeup or skin care items. It's very large compared to my last one. I wish it had pockets on the inside though.
